perturbation.original_text: 1.3. "Distributor" means Siemens, its Affiliates, or any Third Party which has been granted distribution rights whose scope includes the Products and/or Services by Siemens.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.3. "Distributor" means Siemens. For the purposes of clarity within this document, a ‘Partner’ is classified as Siemens, its Affiliates, or any Third Party which has been granted distribution rights whose scope includes the Products and/or Services by Siemens.
perturbation.explanation: The introduction of ‘Partner’ as an alternative and seemingly distinct term for Siemens and related entities leads to confusion. The document states they're both ‘Distributor,’ yet the changed text calls the affiliates ‘Partner.’ This creates uncertainty on which entity is liable for what obligations of ‘Distributor’ throughout the document.

perturbation.original_text: 4.1.1. Fulfillment of Executed Purchase Orders. Accuray is responsible for ensuring that the Products supplied are of good quality as further described below. Accuray will use commercially reasonable efforts to provide to Distributor or Customer, as applicable, in a timely manner those Products and Services required to fill confirmed Purchase Orders received from Distributor in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1.1. Fulfillment of Executed Purchase Orders. Accuray is responsible for ensuring that the goods supplied are of good quality as further described below. Accuray will use commercially reasonable efforts to provide to Retailer or Customer, as applicable, in a timely manner those Products and Services required to fill confirmed Purchase Orders received from Distributor in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Here the word ‘Products’ is replaced by ‘goods’ and ‘Distributor’ is replaced by ‘Retailer’. The text fails to define whether ‘Products’ and ‘goods’ and ‘Distributor’ and ‘Retailer’ are interchangeable, which can lead to confusion.

perturbation.original_text: 3.1. Independent Distributor. Distributor shall be and must at all times make it clear that it is an independent entity contracting with Accuray, and is not the employee, representative or agent of Accuray. Distributor does not have the ability or authority to enter into any legal agreements or obligations that would bind Accuray in any manner.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.1. Independent Vendor. Distributor shall be and must at all times make it clear that it is an independent entity contracting with Accuray, and is not the employee, representative or agent of Accuray. Distributor does not have the ability or authority to enter into any legal agreements or obligations that would bind Accuray in any manner.
perturbation.explanation: Here the word ‘Distributor’ is replaced by ‘Vendor’. The text fails to define whether ‘Distributor’ and ‘Vendor’ are interchangeable, which can lead to confusion.
